title: Test TC-001
objective: Verify user is navigated to the dashboard
preconditions: User is on the login screen
expected_result: User is navigated to the dashboard

title: Test TC-002
objective: Verify error message is displayed for invalid email format
preconditions: User is on the login screen
expected_result: Error message is displayed for invalid email format

title: Test TC-003
objective: Verify error message is displayed for incorrect password
preconditions: User is on the login screen
expected_result: Error message is displayed for incorrect password

title: Test TC-004
objective: Verify error message is displayed for blank password
preconditions: User is on the login screen
expected_result: Error message is displayed for blank password

title: Test TC-005
objective: Verify user is navigated to the password recovery page
preconditions: User is on the login screen
expected_result: User is navigated to the password recovery page

title: Test TC-006
objective: Verify password strength hint is displayed
preconditions: User is on the login screen
steps: Enter a valid email address with a weak password

title: Test TC-007
objective: Verify no password strength hint is displayed
preconditions: User is on the login screen
steps: Enter a valid email address with a strong password
expected_result: No password strength hint is displayed
